ComicInfo.Title: A Space Station Called Hell!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-02 23:21:06. [CVDB99031] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 20:30:45. [Issue ID 217281]
ComicInfo.Characters: Tachyon (blue alien),James Holmes,Elizabeth Lane [Avalon],Cliff Pasternak,Polestar; ,Dot,Nancy Dreiser,Dan Barkins [Impulse]
ComicInfo.Summary: A Space Station Called Hell!: Tachyon returns to the space station looking for a way home. Separately, Dot and Polestar are sent to investigate Project Torch and it's space station.
